summary:
This character uses a torch at night and for combat she uses a bow but mostly uses her flame spell.
She lives in Solitude I have set her as Doesn't Bleed and Essential, she is a high elf race her spells are Flames left hand, Lightning Bolt right hand.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][color=#00ff00][size=6]Wendy[/size][/color][/u][/b][/center]
This character uses a torch at night and for combat she uses a bow but mostly uses her flame spell, she lives in Solitude  and I have set her as
Doesn't Bleed and Essential, and unique.

She is a high elf race her spells are Flames left hand, Lightning Bolt right hand. sometimes you will see her in the [color=#ffff00]Winking Skeever [/color]having a drink and having something to eat, sometimes she will be in the [color=#ffff00]Solitude Temple of the Divines[/color].
Basically she hangs out in a lot of places in Solitude if you have trouble finding her wait till it is about [color=#ffff00]20:00 [/color]head over to the [color=#ffff00]Castle Dour [/color]she will be there eating if you still miss her wait till it is [color=#ffff00]0:00 [/color]she will be sleeping in the basement of the [color=#ffff00]Winking Skeever[/color].

[b][color=#3c78d8][size=4]To install manually:[/size][/color][/b] Click "[color=#3c78d8][b][u]download manually[/u][/b][/color]" then click "[b][color=#3c78d8][u]Save as[/u][/color][/b]" you will need to save it to your Desktop.
Extract then the copy the Data folder then Go to your C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim and past the
Data folder in there and click yes.
author: Skullrot
